form.label: API Big Stats Dashboard - Structured BB2-804
form.description: Top level API stats related to requests, result codes and client info.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ |spath output=name path="message.app_name" | table name | dedup name | sort name
index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ |spath output=ipaddr path="message.ip_addr" | table ipaddr | dedup ipaddr | sort ipaddr

h1.b: API End-Point Requests vs. Total HTTP Requests

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/v1/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | stats count
index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | where call_path != "/health" | stats count
| makeresults | eval Total1=$tokEpCount$, Total2=$tokTcCount$ | eval percent= round((Total1/Total2)*100,1) | table percent

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/v1/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | timechart count
index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | where call_path != "/health" | timechart count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/v1/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") AND "message.path" = "/v1/fhir/*" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/v1/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") AND "message.path" = "/v1/accounts/*" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/v1/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") AND "message.path" = "/v1/o/*" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/v1/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") AND "message.path" = "*/admin/*" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/v1/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") AND ("message.path" != "/v1/fhir/*" AND "message.path" != "/v1/accounts/*" AND "message.path" != "/v1/o/*" AND "message.path" != "*/admin/*") | stats count
| makeresults | eval Total1=$tokEpCount$

h1.b: API Result Codes Over Time Range

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/v1/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | spath output=code path="message.response_code" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | where call_path != "/health" | table code | stats count by code

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/v1/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | spath output=html_code2 path="message.response_code" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | spath output=start_time path="message.start_time" | spath output=end_time path="message.end_time" | eval elapsed_time=start_time-end_time | where call_path != "/health" | table html_code2 call_path elapsed_time | stats count by call_path | sort - count

h1.b: API Response by Status Code and API Call

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/v1/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | spath output=html_code2 path="message.response_code" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | where call_path != "/health" | table html_code2 call_path | chart count(html_code2) over html_code2 by call_path

h1.b: End Point Response Timings (RT_fastest, RT_mean, RT_p95, RT_p99, and RT_slowest time in seconds)

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/v1/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | spath output=html_code2 path="message.response_code" | where html_code2="200" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | regex call_path="/v1/fhir/ExplanationOfBenefit/.*" | spath output=start_time path="message.start_time" | spath output=end_time path="message.end_time" | eval Response_Time=end_time-start_time | stats min(Response_Time) as RT_fastest avg(Response_Time) as RT_mean p95(Response_Time) as RT_p95 p99(Response_Time) as RT_p99 max(Response_Time) as RT_slowest by message.path

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/v1/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | spath output=html_code2 path="message.response_code" | where html_code2="200" | spath output=call_path path="message.path" | where call_path != "/health" | spath output=start_time path="message.start_time" | spath output=end_time path="message.end_time" | eval Response_Time=end_time-start_time | stats min(Response_Time) as RT_fastest avg(Response_Time) as RT_mean p95(Response_Time) as RT_p95 p99(Response_Time) as RT_p99 max(Response_Time) as RT_slowest by message.path | sort - RT_mean | head 10

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/v1/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | spath output=client_id path="message.app_id" | where client_id != "" | stats distinct_count(client_id) as cid_total

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/v1/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | spath output=client_id path="message.app_id" | spath output=name path="message.app_name" | spath output=user path="message.dev_name" | where client_id != "" | stats count by client_id, name, user | sort - count

panel.title: Requests by IP for API Requests Only

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/v1/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | spath output=client_id path="message.app_id" | spath output=name path="message.app_name" | spath output=user path="message.dev_name" | spath output=source_ip path="message.ip_addr" | where client_id != "" | stats count by source_ip,client_id,name,user | sort - count | iplocation source_ip | table source_ip,client_id,name,user,City Region Country,count

panel.title: GeoStats MAP for API Requests Only

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND ("message.path"=".well-known/*" OR "message.path"="/v1/*" OR "message.path"="*/admin/*") | spath output=source_ip path="message.ip_addr"| stats count by source_ip | sort - count | iplocation source_ip | geostats latfield=lat longfield=lon count

panel.title: Requests by IP for ALL Requests

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" | spath output=client_id path="message.app_id" | spath output=name path="message.app_name" | spath output=user path="message.dev_name" | spath output=source_ip path="message.ip_addr" | stats count by source_ip,client_id,name,user | sort - count | iplocation source_ip | table source_ip,client_id,name,user,City Region Country,count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" | spath output=source_ip path="message.ip_addr"| stats count by source_ip | sort - count | iplocation source_ip | geostats latfield=lat longfield=lon count

h1.b: API Result Codes = 403-forbidden for the /v1/connect/userinfo end point. Including those blocked by demographic scopes.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND "message.path"="/v1/connect/userinfo" | search message.response_code=403 | table time message.path message.app_name message.user message.response_code | stats count by message.app_name

panel.title: API Result Codes = 403-forbidden for the /v1/connect/userinfo end point. Including those blocked by demographic scopes.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND "message.path"="/v1/connect/userinfo" | search message.response_code=403 | stats count by message.app_name

h1.b: API Result Codes = 403-forbidden for the /v1/fhir/Patient/ end point. Including those blocked by demographic scopes.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND "message.path"="/v1/fhir/patient*" | search message.response_code=403 | table time message.path message.app_name message.user message.response_code | stats count by message.app_name

panel.title: API Result Codes = 403-forbidden for the /v1/fhir/Patient/ end point. Including those blocked by demographic scopes.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND "message.path"="/v1/fhir/patient*" | search message.response_code=403 | stats count by message.app_name

h1.b: API Result Codes = 403-forbidden for the /v1/fhir/Coverage/ end point. THESE SHOULD NOT BE blocked by demographic scopes.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND "message.path"="/v1/fhir/coverage*" | search message.response_code=403 | table time message.path message.app_name message.user message.response_code | stats count by message.app_name

panel.title: API Result Codes = 403-forbidden for the /v1/fhir/Coverage/ end point. THESE SHOULD NOT BE blocked by demographic scopes.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND "message.path"="/v1/fhir/coverage*" | search message.response_code=403 | stats count by message.app_name

h1.b: API Result Codes = 403-forbidden for the /v1/fhir/ExplanationOfBenefit/ end point. THESE SHOULD NOT BE blocked by demographic scopes.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND "message.path"="/v1/fhir/explanationofbenefit*" | search message.response_code=403 | table time message.path message.app_name message.user message.response_code | stats count by message.app_name

panel.title: API Result Codes = 403-forbidden for the /v1/fhir/ExplanationOfBenefit/ end point. THESE SHOULD NOT BE blocked by demographic scopes.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ $authAppNameExpr$ | search "message.app_name"="$bbAppName$" AND "message.ip_addr"="$bbIpAddr$" AND "message.path"="/v1/fhir/explanationofbenefit*" | search message.response_code=403 | stats count by message.app_name
